subject: Hockey, Ice
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Summertime for 29 N.H.L. general managers is about making repairs, stocking talent and telling yourself and your fans that you were not that far from competing for the Stanley Cup.
snippet: Summertime for 29 N.H.L. general managers is about making repairs, stocking talent and telling yourself and your fans that you were not that far from competing for the Stanley Cup.
